QuizJET authoring tool provides interface to create and mofidy [http://adapt2.sis.pitt.edu/wiki/Smart_Content#Semantics_Problems_for_Java_and_Python parameterized semantics problems], organize such problems into topics, and index such problems with underlying concepts.\n\nAn interface is shown as follows. More details can be found in the Resources links.\n\n[[Image:QuizJETAuthoring.jpg|750x1200px]]\n\n== Resources ==\n* Source codes are available in GitHub in [https://github.com/PAWSLabUniversityOfPittsburgh/QuizJetAuthoring here].\n* User manual is available [https://github.com/PAWSLabUniversityOfPittsburgh/QuizJetAuthoring/blob/master/QuizJetAuthoring-master/doc/User%20Manual%20of%20Quizjet%20Authoring.pdf here].\n* System framework explanation is available [https://github.com/PAWSLabUniversityOfPittsburgh/QuizJetAuthoring/blob/master/QuizJetAuthoring-master/doc/System%20Framework.pdf here].
